title: See 'Star Wars' legend react to Acosta's Darth Vader impression

summary: Actor Mark Hamill joins CNN's Jim Acosta to discuss his thoughts about a potential spinoff series based around his legendary "Star Wars" character Luke Skywalker.
source: CNN.com - RSS Channel - App International Edition
